FORTIS PROLES

Lend Your Heart To Change A Child's Story

Fortis Proles Inc. empowers families and individuals through comprehensive education, life skills training, and community support programs designed to create lasting positive change.

500+

Families Served

15

Years Experience

Our Impact

Creating pathways to prosperity through education, empowerment, and community engagement.

OUR MISSION

Building Stronger Communities

Fortis Proles Inc. is dedicated to strengthening families and communities through comprehensive education, skill development, and sustainable support systems.

Strengthen

Building resilient families through comprehensive support and education programs.

Empower

Providing tools and knowledge to help individuals achieve their full potential.

Transform

Creating lasting positive change in communities through targeted interventions.

Care

Approaching every interaction with compassion, respect, and genuine concern.

Our Vision

To create a world where every family has access to the resources, education, and support needed to thrive and build generational wealth.

Education First

Prioritizing financial literacy, life skills, and professional development.

Community Focused

Building strong networks of support within local communities.

Future Minded

Creating sustainable solutions for long-term success and prosperity.

Our Programs

Comprehensive programs designed to strengthen families, build skills, and create pathways to prosperity.

FOREX Education Program

Comprehensive financial literacy and foreign exchange trading education designed to build generational wealth through informed investment strategies.

Duration:12 weeks
Participants:25 per cohort
Doula Training Certification

Professional doula training program providing comprehensive birth support education and certification for aspiring birth professionals.

Duration:16 weeks
Participants:15 per cohort
Communication Skills Workshop

Essential communication techniques for personal and professional success, focusing on conflict resolution and relationship building.

Duration:8 weeks
Participants:30 per session
Life Skills Development

Practical life skills training covering financial planning, time management, goal setting, and personal development strategies.

Duration:10 weeks
Participants:20 per cohort
Family Engagement Program

Strengthening family bonds through structured activities, communication workshops, and conflict resolution training.

Duration:6 weeks
Participants:12 families
BEBÉ GABA Partnership

Collaborative program with BEBÉ GABA providing specialized support for new parents and early childhood development.

Duration:Ongoing
Participants:Open enrollment

Program Benefits

Expert Instruction

Learn from experienced professionals with real-world expertise in their fields.

Practical Application

Hands-on learning with immediate application to real-life situations.

Ongoing Support

Continued guidance and community support beyond program completion.

Community Partners

Making a Difference

Every program, every workshop, and every interaction is designed to create lasting positive change. Our comprehensive approach addresses immediate needs while building long-term capacity for success.

Evidence-Based

Programs built on proven methodologies and best practices in community development.

Community-Centered

Solutions developed with and for the communities we serve, ensuring cultural relevance.

Sustainable Impact

Focus on building skills and systems that create lasting change beyond program completion.

Join Our Mission

Your time, skills, and passion can make a real difference in the lives of families and children in our community.

Youth Financial Literacy Mentor

Help teach teens FOREX education, budgeting, investing, and entrepreneurship skills through our financial literacy programs.

Doula Training Assistant

Support our doula certification program by assisting with training sessions and connecting youth with birthing center partnerships.

Life Skills Instructor

Teach essential life skills including cooking, parenting, conflict resolution, and career preparation to youth and families.

What Our Community Says

Real stories from families and individuals whose lives have been transformed through our programs.

"The financial literacy program completely changed my family's future. I learned investment strategies that are already showing returns and building our generational wealth."

Maria Rodriguez

FOREX Program Graduate

FOREX Education

Jennifer Thompson

Certified Doula

Doula Training

"The communication skills workshop strengthened my relationship with my teenage daughter. We now have open, honest conversations that bring us closer together."

David Johnson
